sentence.Network_en: They acquire authority from their predictive power.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们的权威性来自其预测事物的能力。

sentence.Network_en: Obviously it is very difficult to describe such a complex system in simple, predictive terms.
sentence.Network_cn: 显然,用简单的预测语言来描述这样一个复杂系统是非常困难的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 提倡预测性(predictive)、预防性(preventive)和个体化(Dersonalized)的3P医学理念。 转化医学早已在全球.

entry.def: You use predictive to describe something such as a test, science, or theory that is concerned with determining what will happen in the future.

example.tran: 经济学在经济预测方面的分支

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to prediction; having value for making predictions
